description:
Discover 3 top apps every day, get them for free to Save money and Excite everyone with your fabulously pimped up smart device!
 
FreeAppMagic Daily helps you Discover the crème de la crème of apps. Save money by getting them while they’re free and Excite friends and family with our fab new selections of apps – by sharing them on facebook, twitter, email or even by text!

Every day we hunt through the 500,000 apps on the App Store and select three of the very best to share with our FreeAppMagic users. And we make sure that the developers keep them free for 24hrs: so our users can have the best apps for free!

You can watch your savings grow in your Magic Piggy Bank as you download great apps every day. 

And you can customise FreeAppMagic Daily by choosing your country and helping it reach the top of the world simply by downloading apps – the more you save, the better your country does!

So download FreeAppMagic Daily right now, choose your country theme and start discovering 3 apps for free every day! 

Enjoy!

* * * * *
We at MagicSolver love working hard to bring you the best app selection every day. If you like FreeAppMagic Daily, please write us a nice review and share the app with your friends!
trackCensoredName: FreeAppMagic Daily - Get Paid Apps For Free Every Day
